ygData.subject: RE: Re: Lizzies in CT
ygData.msgSnippet: That s not it either.  I specifically remember bouncing off of Radiant last night while invis without any problem.  I mean I physically bumped into him will
ygData.messageBody:
That's not it either. I specifically remember bouncing off of Radiant last
night while invis without any problem. I mean I "physically" bumped into
him will jogging to the Archon. They really may have taken away "see invis"
from the lizards in there if they ever had it because getting through the
maze would have been extremely difficult as Sylly describes.

Crier

> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
>
> I have heard that RADIANT in CT sees invis, maybe you ran afoul of
> him/her. She is usualy in the maze with all the others. I know that
> Defenders and Warders do not see invis, as well as all th lizzies in the
> TR (since i often invis by them all to look to see if the Tae Ew Templar
> is in).
>
> Uldar Ulfangson
> 32nd Bard, RodcetNife
> > Message: 5
> > Date: Tue, 30 Nov 1999 15:54:02 -0600
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> > Subject: RE: Cazic-Thule: A recommendation
> >
> > Hmmm, maybe it's my perfume? Or my religion? Rodcet Nife. Or
> my bad luck
> > and invis dropped for a tick. But definitely some lizzies see me.
> > Defenders? Watchmen?
> >
> > Sylly
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
